data.name: Math 24 Solver
data.description:
Math 24 is a game where you're given 4 numbers from 1-9 and have to find a way (there can be more than one) to get to 24 using only addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

Your function should accept an array with 4 numbers from 1-9 and return a string that shows how to reach 24. If there is no solution, it should return null.

Beware of order of operations: 2+3\*5-1 is not a solution but (2+3)\*5-1 is.

Examples:
```javascript
math24([3,3,3,3])="3*3*3-3"

math24([4,4,4,4])="4*4+4+4"

math24([3,6,7,9])="3*7-6+9"

math24([3,6,7,1])="1*6*(7-3)"

math24([1,1,1,1])=null
```

Note: You may have to rearrange the values of the array to find a solution.
